sentences.en: a volume of Keats’s poetry
sentences.cn: 一本济慈的诗集

sentences.en: Can you turn the volume up?
sentences.cn: 请你把音量调大好吗？

sentences.en: Classically, overweight people underestimate the volume of food that they consume.
sentences.cn: 一般来说，超重的人往往低估自己摄入食物的量。

sentences.en: Each volume is bound in bright-coloured cloth.
sentences.cn: 每一卷都采用色彩亮丽的布面装帧。

sentences.en: From his study came the sound of Mahler, playing at full volume.
sentences.cn: 从他的书房里传出马勒的乐曲，音量开到了最大。

sentences.en: Gil rose and went to his bookcase and took down a volume.
sentences.cn: 吉尔站起身，走到书架跟前，取下一本书。

sentences.en: He came to complain about the volume of the music.
sentences.cn: 他过来抱怨音乐的音量太高了。

sentences.en: He turned down the volume.
sentences.cn: 他调低了音量。

sentences.en: I turned the volume up.
sentences.cn: 我调高了音量。

sentences.en: Set the volume as high as possible.
sentences.cn: 将音量尽量调大。

sentences.en: She could not bear the relentless music and turned down the volume.
sentences.cn: 她受不了没完没了的音乐，就把音量调小了。

sentences.en: Simon lifted a weighty volume from the shelf.
sentences.cn: 西蒙从书架上取下一本厚重的书。

sentences.en: Someone cranked up the volume of the public address system.
sentences.cn: 有人调大了公共广播系统的音量。

sentences.en: The period from 1940 – 1945 is in volume 9.
sentences.cn: 1940年至1945年这段时间在第9卷。

sentences.en: The volume of gas trapped on these surfaces can be considerable.
sentences.cn: 存留在这些表面的气体体积可能相当大。

sentences.en: The volume of scheduled flights is straining the air traffic control system.
sentences.cn: 定期航班的数量正让空中交通指挥系统不堪重负。

sentences.en: The volume of the container measures 10,000 cubic metres.
sentences.cn: 这个容器的容量是1万立方米。

sentences.en: the volume of trade
sentences.cn: 贸易量

sentences.en: Their collective volume wasn't very large.
sentences.cn: 他们的总量不是太大。

sentences.en: This volume of essays was designed to accompany an exhibition in Cologne.
sentences.cn: 这本文集是为配合在科隆举办的一场展览而出的。

words.tran_cn: 成卷的；有…册的；（烟雾）成团的
[物] 体积的；[物] 容积的；[物] 测定体积的
大量的；多卷的，长篇的；著书多的
[仪] 体积计，[仪] 容积计

phrases.tran_cn: 总体积；总容积；总成交量
n. 体积变化，容积变化
[电]音量控制；容量调节；卷控制
体积分率，体积分数；容积率
批量生产，成批生成；容积产量

trans.tran_en: the amount of sound produced by a television, radio etc
